title: Id Disney Nature rounded italic type
content:
Does anyone recognize the rounded italic typeface used throughout this site design? It’s on the tip of my tongue but I just can’t remember it. Any help is appreciated. Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090501223836im_/http:/typophile.com/files/thirtytwoRound---Andy-Gugel_4334.jpg)
author: designworklife

comments.content: Looks like it could be century gothic \*is looking at the body text\*
Yup. Omnes. The ’now playing’ etc. is Gotham.
Ah, thanks so much! It was driving me crazy trying to figure it out!
